boardgame.name: Fire in the Lake
boardgame.description: (from GMT website:)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Volume IV in GMT_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s COIN Series dives headlong into the momentous and complex battle for South Vietnam. A unique multi-faction treatment of the Vietnam War, Fire in the Lake will take 1 to 4 players on US heliborne sweeps of the jungle and Communist infiltration of the South, and into inter-allied conferences, Saigon politics, interdiction of the Ho Chi Minh Trail, air defense of Northern infrastructure, graduated escalation, and media war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Renowned designer and modern warfare expert Mark Herman joins COIN Series creator Volko Ruhnke for a collaborative production not to be missed. Fire in the Lake features the same card-assisted counterinsurgency game system as GMT's Andean Abyss, Cuba Libre, and A Distant Plain, with a pack of twists that take the Series to another level, including:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pivotal events that trump initiative (Tet Offensive, Vietnamization, Easter Offensive, and Linebacker II)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Inter-coup campaign effects that vary by RVN leader_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Counterinsurgent guerrillas (US-led Irregulars and ARVN Rangers)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Insurgent troops (NVA) for direct force-on-force engagements_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Tunneled VC and NVA bases_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Trail construction and degradation_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A larger-than-ever event deck for even greater play variety_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Short and medium-length scenarios with either random or period-event options_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DESIGNER: Mark Herman _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Volko Ruhnke_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;SERIES DEVELOPER: Mike Bertucelli_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;MAP ART: Chechu Nieto_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;COUNTER _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; CARDS ART _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; RULES LAYOUT: Mark Simonitch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

GMT Games (GMT1409) Never Get Out of the Boat! Vietnam, 1964. The most wrenching US engagement of the Cold War would be far more than GI versus Charlie. The conflict had set tribesman against nationalist, Buddhist against Catholic, mandarin against villager, and of course Northerner against Southerner-even among the communists. As revolutionary change burned through that ancient civilization, Washington would apply its armament and its operations research. To get out, the US counterinsurgency would have to motor deeper and deeper in. In the end, culture and will would overcome technology and math and signal the end of the primacy of industrial might in modern warfare. Volume IV in GMT_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s COIN Series dives headlong into the momentous and complex battle for South Vietnam. A unique multi-faction treatment of the Vietnam War, Fire in the Lake will take 1 to 4 players on US heliborne sweeps of the jungle and Communist infiltration of the South, and into inter-allied conferences, Saigon politics, interdiction of the Ho Chi Minh Trail, air defense of Northern infrastructure, graduated escalation, and media war. Renowned designer and modern warfare expert Mark Herman joins COIN Series creator Volko Ruhnke for a collaborative production not to be missed. Fire in the Lake features the same card-assisted counterinsurgency game system as GMT_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Andean Abyss, Cuba Libre, and A Distant Plain, with a pack of twists that take the Series to another level! As with earlier COIN Series volumes, players of Fire in the Lake will face difficult strategic decisions with each card. The innovative game system smoothly integrates political, cultural, and economic affairs with military and other violent and non-violent operations and capabilities. Terror and subversion, pacification, infiltration, NVA long-range bombardment, road and river ambushes, VC front taxation, aid diversion, US bombing of the Trail, Montagnard recruitment, ARVN Ranger raids, and many more options are on the menu. Flow charts are at hand to run any faction missing a player-solitaire, 2-player, 3-player, or 4-player experiences are equally supported. Ride on up the river.

Punched and played one time. Wooden markers bagged by faction. Counters, dice, pawns, all in GMT Tray. Counters all clipped with 2.5mm corner rounder so they look very nice. Includes custom made sideboard for those who need to play the game facing the long edge. Same scale as the main board, just puts the RVN Leader card and faction tracking in easier reach.
this is for auction winner godeg. Do not buy unless you are him.
Counter in GMT Trays, Played two times , very good condition

For international orders, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll discount $3 off whatever the actual shipping price would be. I really appreciate your purchase! PayPal, credit cards (via PayPal), and Money Orders / Personal Checks welcome. For checks and money orders, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll reserve the game and ship it to you as soon as funds clear. *** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,000 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $12 shipping to continental US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason
